name: patchdom
description: 1 kB JavaScript Virtual DOM builder and patch function.
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/patchdom.js -o dist/patchdom.js --mangle --compress warnings=false --pure-funcs=Object.defineProperty -p relative --in-source-map dist/patchdom.js.map --source-map dist/patchdom.js.map
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
